document.discussion_title: Fmr MHA official rubbishes PC's claim
document.topic_text: You are here: Home » Exclusives » News Fmr MHA official rubbishes PC's claim Please enable the javascript of your browser to see the video. URL: Comment After former Home Minister P Chidambaram blamed him for the first affidavit filed over Ishrat Jahan case, former Under Secretary RVS Mani rejecting the former HM's claims, and maintained that the file was signed and approved by P Chidambaram.
